component.name: 2dTaskBoard
component.summary: Task management application that allows you to divide the task board into rows and columns and to format the text using Markdown.

ul.li: Board is 2-dimentional so you can move tasks between both rows and columns
Filesystem based - you can store your data as files and synchronize it using cloud providers or track changes with git
Attachments - you can attach files to your tasks
Compatibility with Obsidian - you can open your tasks there and even link them to your existing notes
